data.description: Play audio (wma mp3) video (wmv mpeg avi)
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The module call Win32::API module to manipulate winmm.lib play
    AUDIO and Video File on Win32 platform, It can help us play AUDIO /
    VIDEO in Tk or Win32::GUI to design a Win32 GUI Program.

    (Although the MPEG::MP3Play can help us to play *.mp3 file, but it
    cannot play WMA file)
